solution_line_template: To go to school and back, Shane drives {trips_per_day}*{miles_one_way} = <<{trips_per_day}*{miles_one_way}={miles_per_day}>>{miles_per_day} miles per day.
In {semester_days} days of a semester, he drives for {semester_days}*{miles_per_day} = <<{semester_days}*{miles_per_day}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles
